FuncDef: The display ospf abr-asbr command displays information about the ABRs and ASBRs of OSPF. The display ospf abr-asbr command displays information about the ABRs and ASBRs of OSPF.

ParaDef.Info:
process-id Specifies the ID of an OSPF process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Specifies the router ID of an ABR or ASBR.
Dotted decimal notation.
